lines: Murinzi we vuz'inzamba, ubwir'umuntu wese. Ng'uz'umv'iyo nkuru nziza, Yihan'akizw'ivyaha.
Murinzi we vuz'inzamba, Isamirane hose, Menyesha bos'ubutumwa, Imbohe zibohorwe
Yivugirize mu mpinga, Mw'ishamba mu kiyaya, N'abo mu kiyaga bose, Bameny'ako gakiza.
Yivugirize mu nzira, Mu mwiherero hose, Dat' arabarindiriye, Vyose birateguwe.
Uyivugiriz'induhe, ngo na zo zibohorwe, Yes'arabatumir'ati : muze ndabaruhure.
